user_query: My family and I are planning a road trip across the United States and we want to explore the local cuisine in each state. Can you provide me with trending dishes and recipes from different regions? Additionally, can you suggest some must-visit restaurants along our route?

TaskList.description: Gather trending dishes and recipes from different regions across the United States.
Identify and suggest must-visit restaurants along the road trip route based on the gathered dishes.
Compile a summary of trending dishes, recipes, and recommended restaurants for easy reference during the trip.
